```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
```

#### Load and tidy data

```{r read_data}
file = as.data.frame(list.files(path = "./data")) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  rename(file_name = list_files_path_data)

read_data = function(csv_name){
  csv_name = str_c("./data/", as.character(csv_name))
  read.csv(csv_name)
}

file = bind_cols(file, map_df(.x = file[[1]], ~read_data(.x)))
```
